outputs.output_descr: The purpose of Flexible Funding Facility is to provide technical and financial support to the Government of Lao PDR to enhance its capacity  in areas of researach and analytical work that will effectively support the policy formulation and implementation process related to discussions at the Round Table related forums.

project_descr: Flexible Funding Facility to Support the Round Table Process
project_title: Flexible Funding Facility to support the Round Table Pro
